AIRLINE LOGO FILENAME REFERENCE
================================

Upload your airline logos with these exact filenames:

aer-lingus.png (or .jpg/.svg)           → Aer Lingus
aerolineas-argentinas.png               → Aerolíneas Argentinas
aeromexico.png                          → Aeroméxico
air-canada.png                          → Air Canada
air-france.png                          → Air France
air-india.png                           → Air India
air-new-zealand.png                     → Air New Zealand
airasia.png                             → AirAsia
alitalia.png                            → Alitalia
all-nippon-airways.png                  → All Nippon Airways
american-airlines.png                   → American Airlines
asiana-airlines.png                     → Asiana Airlines
azul.png                                → Azul
batik-air.png                           → Batik Air
british-airways.png                     → British Airways
brussels-airlines.png                   → Brussels Airlines
cathay-pacific.png                      → Cathay Pacific
cebu-pacific.png                        → Cebu Pacific
china-eastern.png                       → China Eastern
china-southern-airlines.png             → China Southern Airlines
delta-air-lines.png                     → Delta Air Lines
easyjet.png                             → easyJet
emirates.png                            → Emirates
ethiopian-airlines.png                  → Ethiopian Airlines
etihad-airways.png                      → Etihad Airways
fiji-airways.png                        → Fiji Airways
finnair.png                             → Finnair
garuda-indonesia.png                    → Garuda Indonesia
hainan-airlines.png                     → Hainan Airlines
iberia.png                              → Iberia
indigo.png                              → IndiGo
japan-airlines.png                      → Japan Airlines
jetstar.png                             → Jetstar
kenya-airways.png                       → Kenya Airways
klm.png                                 → KLM
korean-air.png                          → Korean Air
latam-airlines.png                      → LATAM Airlines
lufthansa.png                           → Lufthansa
norwegian-air.png                       → Norwegian Air
oman-air.png                            → Oman Air
pegasus.png                             → Pegasus
philippine-airlines.png                 → Philippine Airlines
qantas.png                              → Qantas
qatar-airways.png                       → Qatar Airways
ryanair.png                             → Ryanair
s7-airlines.png                         → S7 Airlines
saudia.png                              → Saudia
scandinavian-airlines.png               → Scandinavian Airlines
scoot.png                               → Scoot
shenzhen-airlines.png                   → Shenzhen Airlines
singapore-airlines.png                  → Singapore Airlines
south-african-airways.png               → South African Airways
spicejet.png                            → SpiceJet
swiss.png                               → SWISS
thai-airways.png                        → Thai Airways
turkish-airlines.png                    → Turkish Airlines
united-airlines.png                     → United Airlines
vietjet-air.png                         → VietJet Air
vistara.png                             → Vistara
wizz-air.png                            → Wizz Air

SUPPORTED FORMATS: .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .svg, .webp
RECOMMENDED: PNG with transparent background, 64x64px to 128x128px
